text: The Jardin Paléobotanique is a botanical garden located in Les Millières, Soulce-Cernay, Doubs, Franche-Comté, France. The garden contains about 500 types of plants, including rare species and prehistoric trees such as Ginkgo biloba. It is open Sundays and holidays in the warmer months; an admission fee is charged. == See also == * List of botanical gardens in France == References == * Le Pays de Lomont: Soulce-Cernay * FRACAS 2006, page 28 * France Tourisme Informations description (French) * Tout de France entry (Dutch) * France, le trésor des régions (French) Category:Gardens in Doubs Category:Botanical gardens in France
title: Jardin Paléobotanique
